lead_paragraph: BERNSTEIN--Irving. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Irving Bernstein, a beloved long-time leader of our Long Island community. His exceptional philanthropic traditions live on through the generosity of his cherished family. We extend our condolences to Irving's wife, Phyllis; his children, Barbara Bloom (Myron) and Steven (Diane); his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; John S. Ruskay, Executive VP & CEO
